Pyramid & Bootstrap¶

These examples demonstrate some ways to make pyramid play nicely with Bootstrap.

Bootstrap Resources

  • Bootstrap CSS
  • Bootstrap Components

Examples

  • Automatic “active” Navigation Tabs
  • Bootstrap Form Validation States
  • Bootstrap Progress Bar w/ Simple Ajax

Quickstart¶

To include bootstrap, just add the following lines to the <head> of the base template. Bootstrap has this same example on their getting started page.

<!-- jQuery required for Bootstrap -->
<script src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.11.3/jquery.min.js"></script>

<!-- Bootstrap Javascript -->
<script src="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/3.3.6/js/bootstrap.min.js" integrity="sha384-0mSbJDEHialfmuBBQP6A4Qrprq5OVfW37PRR3j5ELqxss1yVqOtnepnHVP9aJ7xS" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>

<!-- Bootstrap Styling -->
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/3.3.6/css/bootstrap.min.css" integrity="sha384-1q8mTJOASx8j1Au+a5WDVnPi2lkFfwwEAa8hDDdjZlpLegxhjVME1fgjWPGmkzs7" crossorigin="anonymous">
